original_title: 地味だけど実は肉食な幼なじみと5日間の食べられ同棲生活 水卜さくら
overview: I have a childhood friend who is my classmate. But recently, we haven't talked at all, but while my parents and Sakura's parents are going on a trip, we'll be staying at my house together... Then it turns out that she was a ridiculous carnivorous slut even though she looks like a quiet person. She says she can't sleep alone because she's too scared to sleep, but she comes into the futon with spears. I was pulled out for 5 days.
title: My Childhood Friend Is A Plain Jane But The Truth Is She’s A Hungry Bitch I Spent 5 Days With Her As She Sexually Devoured Me
